usa_today_ad_meter_top_10: Bud Light - Big Men on Cul-De-Sac
usa_today_ad_meter_bottom_10: Squarespace - A Tale As Old As Websites
T-Mobile - A New Era in Connectivity
Hims & Hers - Sick of the System

notes.source: Real-time commercial tracking by Benzinga during Super Bowl LIX broadcast, February 9, 2025
notes.timing_categories: Commercials organized by when they aired: After National Anthem, After Coin Toss, First Quarter, Second Quarter, Halftime/Third Quarter, Fourth Quarter, and Post-Game
notes.ad_pricing_note: 30-second ad slots sold for $7-8 million, with some last-minute slots selling for $8 million or more
notes.viewership_note: Most-watched Super Bowl in history with 126 million average viewers and peak of 135.7 million during second quarter
notes.winner_note: Anheuser-Busch InBev dominated USA Today Ad Meter with 4 ads in top 10 (Budweiser #1, Michelob Ultra #3, Stella Artois #4, Bud Light #7)
notes.kanye_controversy: Kanye West bought local ad time on 4 Fox stations promoting Yeezy website; after airing, site showed swastika merchandise and was taken down by Shopify
notes.nike_note: Nike aired first Super Bowl ad since 1988, focusing on women's sports
notes.limitations: Exact clock timestamps (specific game time) not publicly available; timing based on quarter/broadcast segments
